main event: An unidentified object shaped like a three-fingered hand was observed emitting a brilliant white light in Ft. Myers, Florida.
interesting points: The object was described as having a dark core with diffused light behind it., The duration of the observation was 1 minute., The observer used 8x55 binoculars for a better view., The object was stationary and possibly rising slightly., The sighting was deemed likely to be a balloon based on its description and environmental factors.
sighted object: one object shaped as a three-fingered hand emitting white light
